recipesJson.name: Black 1 / Signiture orange remix
recipesJson.author: Tvsty1
recipesJson.description:
I'm 99% sure riot squads black 1 & Signiture orange are the same eliquid (black 1 was just limited edition)

Jelly candy & sweet tangerine are definitely the main the flavours in this eliquid.

Jelly candy at 3.5% is about as high as I want to go, anything higher and it gives off a strange note.

Cap sweet tangerine is are main note for the tangerine. At 4.5% it's upfront n in your face.

Cap juicy orange & cap juicy lemon are there as a bridge between the tangerine & jelly candy. Plus they brighten the whole recipe.

Super sweet is obviously here as it's a premium eliquid. 

If you want something that is much closer to the original then just do
6% cap sweet tangerine
3% cap jelly candy
1% cap super sweet.
